item.title: CIS -CAT Pro Assessor v3 Full and Dissolvable
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://cisecurity.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portal/15/article/2434301961 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-44228: Vulnerable NCSC-NL Upgrade to v3.0.77. The next release for CIS products listed in the table below is currently targeted for January 25, 2022. That release will include an update from Log4j 2.15.0 to Log4j 2.16.0 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-27 15:29:04 NCSC-NL Updated communityVulnerable.
